line.comment: * Step 2: diary -> earn 100 rep points towards a company.
* Step 4: company introduction when rep goal is reached -> rendezvous to an Unknown sector.
* Create the ship if it does not already exist.
* Step 6: TS killed -> kill $objective.step6 M6 Battle group.
* Step 7: M6 killed -> unlock a Teladi stock exchange.
* Step 8: stock exchange unlocked -> wait for another message.
* Mayhem 2.7.0: remove the TL escorting mission. Steps 11 and 12 are removed.
* Step 13: a TL has been given and setup through the menu in Menu.DWM.Set.Hangar. Rift feature. -> complete the first rift.
* Step 14: the rift has been completed -> wait another message.
* $mainObjective here is the name of the leader of the marines who have been sent into the rift. The four new marines are created through Mayhem.Task.Expedition.
* Step 16: credits given (mainStoryObjective set to null by Menu.Mayhem.Ministry.SM), unlock insurance feature -> wait another message.
* $mainObjective is set to null when the money is given.
* Step 17: -> board an M6 and take control.
* Step 18: M6 boarded, funds received -> destroy a flagship.
* Step 20: Nividium gathered into one ship. -> build the portal.
* Find a sector with a free South warp gate.
* mainStoryObjective is set to null when the portal is completed. mainStoryShip is actually the ship that started the building.
* Step 22: arrival in Blue Horizon. -> dock to the Sanctuary
* Step 23: docked at Sanctuary -> wait next message

sval.val: Step 2: diary -> earn 100 rep points towards a company.
Step 4: company introduction when rep goal is reached -> rendezvous to an Unknown sector.
Create the ship if it does not already exist.
Step 6: TS killed -> kill $objective.step6 M6 Battle group.
Step 7: M6 killed -> unlock a Teladi stock exchange.
Step 8: stock exchange unlocked -> wait for another message.
Mayhem 2.7.0: remove the TL escorting mission. Steps 11 and 12 are removed.
Step 13: a TL has been given and setup through the menu in Menu.DWM.Set.Hangar. Rift feature. -> complete the first rift.
Step 14: the rift has been completed -> wait another message.
$mainObjective here is the name of the leader of the marines who have been sent into the rift. The four new marines are created through Mayhem.Task.Expedition.
Step 16: credits given (mainStoryObjective set to null by Menu.Mayhem.Ministry.SM), unlock insurance feature -> wait another message.
$mainObjective is set to null when the money is given.
Step 17: -> board an M6 and take control.
Step 18: M6 boarded, funds received -> destroy a flagship.
Step 20: Nividium gathered into one ship. -> build the portal.
Find a sector with a free South warp gate.
mainStoryObjective is set to null when the portal is completed. mainStoryShip is actually the ship that started the building.
Step 22: arrival in Blue Horizon. -> dock to the Sanctuary
Step 23: docked at Sanctuary -> wait next message
